data.eml:eml: A new species, new synonymy and new records of Mexican and Central American Xyleborini (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Scolytinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Atkinson, Thomas H. (2018): A new species, new synonymy and new records of Mexican and Central American Xyleborini (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Scolytinae). Zootaxa 4442 (2): 345-350, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4442.2.11
